Name: The Lonely Helmet
About the game: In a galaxy far far away, there was a collection of helmets. Some were stronger than others, some were smaller and some were bigger, but all helmets had a purpose - to protect their space-human and allow them to breath outside of the Universe. The Lonely Helmet, a space-themed puzzle platformer, will have you jumping and sliding through levels after being tasked to find the human that was meant to be wearing you on their head outside the ISS. Features Single-Player Multiple Helmets unlockable by collecting in-game stars* 20 Levels at Launch *No real money purchase required. All helmet skins are unlocked by simply playing the game and collecting stars on each level.
